A short tour about who we are.
En el año 2018 tuvimos la idea de formar: In 2018 we had the idea of forming Comanimals, an application to encompass all possible aspects about pets. In 2019 we finally launched the project.
Los primeros vocetos de esta nuestra lan: We created the first voices of our landing page in November 2019, after several changes and versions we finished our landing.
Constatamos las primeras necesidades que: We verify the first needs that our application would have and begin its design.
Añadimos los veterinarios y hoteles a nu: We add veterinarians and hotels to our previous services offered with the shelters and shelters.
